'''Salt for My Foes, and Water for Me''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to obtain at least three healing orbs fired from the "water droplets" during the [[Hydro Hypostasis]] fight.
